body:
- Registering package: ICD_GEMs
- Repository: https://github.com/InPhyT/ICD_GEMs.jl
- Created by: @pitmonticone
- Version: v0.1.0
- Commit: a178fdaa5151e294c38d05191351243fb5504ab6
- Reviewed by: @pitmonticone
- Reference: https://github.com/InPhyT/ICD_GEMs.jl/commit/a178fdaa5151e294c38d05191351243fb5504ab6#commitcomment-74064069
- Description: A Julia package that allows to translate ICD-9 in ICD-10 codes and viceversa via the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) General Equivalence Mappings (GEMs).

title: New package: ICD_GEMs v0.1.0
